messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Welcome to the ssstation, have a good ssshift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Your Captain hasss been removed due to reasssonsss that are classsified have a nice day the line of command ssshould passs down to your hop or any remaining headsss have a nice day.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello Everyone It's I! Indrick Boreale! Here to be your Acting captain, Hey someone get that PANDEMIC machine running though

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Engineering, please come fix the doors and scrubbers around the station

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Do we call the shuttle? Aye or Nay

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright! We'll call the shuttle, but First! Bring the puppies from HOS' office, and second, lynch the Viroligist for fucking up the atmos!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: GET PUPPIES TO THE EVAC! GO GO GO!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
